FuncDef: The admin command displays the admin view in which you can divide a physical system (PS) into virtual systems (VSs) .
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before an administrator divides a PS into VSs to improve capital allocation and achieve horizontal or vertical network integration, the administrator must run the admin command to enter the admin view.
Configuration Impact
After entering the admin view, the PS administrator can create VSs.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
